Geotechnical Research Medal, Institution of Civil Engineers, UK

The award was founded following a bequest by the late A.W. Bishop, which provided the die for the medal.  The medal is awarded annually to the author(s) of the best contribution in the field of research in geotechnical engineering published by the Institution in the previous year.
